page.title: 04HOUSING (cntd.)
page.content: Anton Hill 8580 large{double fronted} {farmhouse}facing south. A modern bungalow 1960 adjoins. Spion Kop 8680 a 3 roomed 2 storey cottage. Lee Hall Farmhouse 8680 south facing next to 1983{bungalow,} small stone Lee Hall cottages 8687 and to Lee Hall a fine 3 storied{Georgian House}of 5 bays, middle arched doorway, arched window above, site of famous "Long Pack" legend. High Countess Park 8680 stone house facing south. Heugh 8180 stone farmhouse south situation above old railway tracks. Woodpark 8479 old stone farmhouse adjacent to B6320 south facing. Bankhead 8479 small 2 storey cottage and smallholding. The Green 8579 originally a farmhouse now private house.Green cottage adjoining, 1 storey. High Carry House 8679{stone} {house}overlooking old railway near Birtley Shields 8879.
